CustomField.description: The campaign names(s) used to total up the campaign fundraising and cash totals in the constituent/organization overview page and the giving details page. For more than one appeal, separate appeal names with a semicolon.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The campaign names(s) used to total up the campaign fundraising and cash totals in the constituent/organization overview page and the giving details page. For more than one appeal, separate appeal names with a semicolon.
CustomField.label: Giving Summary Campaign Appeal
